com.azure.android.core.http

Class ServiceClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.azure.android.core.http.ServiceClient

  • public class ServiceClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Type that stores information used to create REST API Client instances that share common resources such as an HTTP connection pool, callback executor, etc.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  ServiceClient.Builder
      A builder to configure and build a ServiceClient.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close and release any resources reserved for the ServiceClient.
      java.lang.String getBaseUrl()
      Gets a base URL that will be used for any API Client created using a configured Retrofit, which can be accessed using getRetrofit().
      retrofit2.Retrofit getRetrofit()
      Gets this ServiceClient's Retrofit instance, which can be used to create API Clients.
      SerializerAdapter getSerializerAdapter()
      The request or response content serializer adapter that will be used by any API Client created using a configured Retrofit, which can be accessed using getRetrofit().
      ServiceClient.Builder newBuilder() 

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getRetrofit

        public retrofit2.Retrofit getRetrofit()
        Gets this ServiceClient's Retrofit instance, which can be used to create API Clients.
        Returns:
        The Retrofit instance.

      • getBaseUrl

        public java.lang.String getBaseUrl()
        Gets a base URL that will be used for any API Client created using a configured Retrofit, which can be accessed using getRetrofit().
        Returns:
        The Retrofit base URL.

      • getSerializerAdapter

        public SerializerAdapter getSerializerAdapter()
        The request or response content serializer adapter that will be used by any API Client created using a configured Retrofit, which can be accessed using getRetrofit().
        Returns:
        The serializer adapter.

      • newBuilder

        public ServiceClient.Builder newBuilder()
        Returns:
        A new builder with configurations copied from this ServiceClient.

      • close

        public void close()
        Close and release any resources reserved for the ServiceClient.
